extendedInfo.description: From 2013/7/12 3days Summer Sale!*************************************************A game which gives you great fun and cute,like a dress up dollis now available on "Android Apps"!It's called "Dress Up School Brand"*************************************************100% Cute & Lovely!"Dress Up School Brand" can enjoy the dress up by a very simple operation. Let's dress up girls to the pretty[kawaii] [cawaii] school girls. -It is popular among the high school girls and the junior high girls. -Easy operation that can play easily by everyone.-Abundant items of 140 or more!-Hairstyle, knit,ribbon,necktie,skirt,sailor blouse, and blazer,socks,Loafer,shoes and a lot of skirt variations!-You can select it in a lot of backgrounds,Classroom, Pool, Room, and School ï½¥ï½¥ï½¥-------------------------------------------------How To Play-------------------------------------------------â Tap the icon in screen to change School items appear.â The School Uniform and the item can drag and move by the finger.â The School Uniform and the item not needed remove from girl's body and disappear icon touching.â The variation changes one after another if the background background icon touches.-------------------------------------------------Select Pink and white and it transforms to coordination like a lovely younger sister.Select black and navy. It transforms to the upperclassman cool style coordination. The skirt of the rather short is necessary for the large best. Let's Dress Up to original coordination or today's feelings selection JK/JC fashion of a fit color.  and Play fun!

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: The game is good, but it should have backpacks and more stockings
reviews.author: Deitra Pawley
